title: That Can’t Be Good
author: VD
content_html:
COMEX: Delisting of the Gold Kilo Futures, London Spot Gold Futures, London Silver Spot Futures, and Cleared OTC London Gold Forwards Contracts

I have no idea what this means, but I’m fairly sure it doesn’t bode well.
